name: LineCrossed
description: Represents a line crossed event. The flowId is expected to be in the form of <stream id>.<engine id>.<line name>

tags.name: object_id
tags.description: Tracked object Id of the object crossing the line.

tags.name: frame_id
tags.description: ID of the input video frame fed to the inference engine.

tags.name: direction
tags.description: Direction in which the line was crossed.
